ygData.subject: In the Jungle
ygData.msgSnippet: Having a general location over for where the patrol area was, annoyed at the Maximal base leader, Wheelie had decided to take things over to his own servos.

Having a general location over for where the patrol area was, annoyed at th=
e Maximal base leader, Wheelie had decided to take things over to his own s=
ervos.

For the moment, as he went towards the jungle, his orange frame in =
vehicle mode being rapidly caked over in mud and dust, obscuring and low ag=
ainst the ground.

As he zoomed, wheelie lowered his speed to a walking pac=
e.  No sense in getting his wheels or internals gummed.  Getting good and c=
aked, as he moved along seeming just like another animal or bit of dirt bei=
ng blown in the wind.

While Wheelie was not stealthed, he took care to min=
imize his sensor profile and keep his scanners on passive, focusin gmainly =
on visual scanners.

While Wheelie may not be used to ancient earth, nor fu=
lly acclimated with it to any degree, what he was was a Survivor.

The seem=
ingly but not Young Autobot had spent over a hundred and twenty thousand vo=
rn, over ten million years in the prison planet Quintessa, surviving being =
hunted by endless hordes of Sharkticons nad Alligatrons, the innumerable be=
asts the Quintessons kept as slaves and guards.  Taking their parts to fix =
hismnelf, stealing their fuel cores to keep himself repaired, using their w=
eapons for booby traps.

On earth, the wildlife would give any Cybertronian=
 pause.  And as for the Predacons..  Wheelie would wonder how they would do=
 up against a Sharkticon.

Wheelie did things his own way, having a stubbor=
n streak and independent, loyal to his friends but seeing things through hi=
s own twisted sense of logic and priorities.  His age equal to before the l=
ast war had began, the Autobot had learned to do things the hard way, and c=
ould keep his own paths to his form.

And so, as he went to the firs tpatro=
l zone he had been assigned, he slowed further, his body caked in mud, dirt=
, and grime several inches thick, leaves and organic deritus on top making =
him near impossible to pick out on visuals, and his heat signature minimize=
d on scanners as he went low to the ground, alert for Predacons, Decepticon=
s, or booby traps ahead, passive sensors and the like.

While he might not =
know what he was up against..  Neither did they.
